import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Grid, Typography } from "@material-ui/core"; import { InputField, CheckboxField, SelectField, SelectUserField, } from "../../FormFields"; import AssignmentIcon from "@material-ui/icons/Assignment"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { selectUserList } from "../../../../../../redux/user/user.selector"; export default function BuyerForm(props) { const user_list = useSelector((state) => selectUserList(state)); const { formField: { abn, supp_name, contact_name, contact_email, telephone, mobile, buyer_annual_spend_apprx, primary_buyer_contact, address_line, address_suburb, address_state, address_postcode, company_email, website, comments, supplier_revenue_annual, company_size, supp_city, supplier_country, }, } = props; return ( Contract Information
Supplier Contact Info Supplier Address Info ); }
